columns.Company_ID: The unique identifier for a company in the database.
columns.People_ID: The unique identifier for a person employed at the company.
columns.Year_working: The total years a person has worked at the company.

employment.table_description: The table tracks employment details between companies and employees.

columns.People_ID: The unique identifier for each person in the database.
columns.Age: The age of the person in years.
columns.Name: The full name of the person.
columns.Nationality: The country of citizenship for the person.
columns.Graduation_College: The college where the person graduated.

people.table_description: The table stores personal details of individuals in the company.

columns.Company_ID: The unique identifier for each company in the database.
columns.Name: The official name of the company.
columns.Headquarters: The country where the company's headquarters are located.
columns.Industry: The sector in which the company operates.
columns.Sales_in_Billion: The total sales revenue of the company in billions.
columns.Profits_in_Billion: The total profits made by the company in billions.
columns.Assets_in_Billion: The total assets owned by the company in billions.
columns.Market_Value_in_Billion: The total market value of the company in billions.

company.table_description: The table lists various details and financial metrics of companies.
